title: BliStrTune: Hierarchical Invention of Theorem Proving Strategies
abstract: Inventing targeted proof search strategies for specific problem sets is a difficult task. State-of-the-art automated theorem provers (ATPs) such as E allow a large number of user-specified proof search strategies described in a rich domain specific language. Several machine learning methods that invent strategies automatically for ATPs were proposed previously. One of them is the Blind Strategymaker (BliStr), a system for automated invention of ATP strategies.
histories: Submitted to Certified Programs and Proofs (CPP 2017)
COMMENTS: Submitted to Certified Programs and Proofs (CPP 2017)
